thread.section_title: Hotel de Seze - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great hotel, fine location
thread.title_full: Great hotel, fine location - Review of Hotel de Seze, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Tim M
title: Great hotel, fine location
text: We used this hotel as our base for a long weekend, mainly walking around Paris. Very pleasant hotel, quiet, very friendly and helpful staff. Location is just right for exploring the central parts of Paris. Bus 42 from Gard du Nord stops just outside the hotel! Though the hotel is in a busy area and our room was on the street side, we were completely undisturbed at night. We'll definitely come back here when we are next in Paris.
